name: FrontFight
description:
FrontFight is a 2D Top-Down multiplayer shooter game, with balanced weapons, smooth controls, and fun gameplay!

------------------------

❄ Winter update!❄ 

Winter is here as well as FrontFight update!

-SMG
-Bazooka
-Exclusive winter bundle
-Spectating
-Improved statistics
-Improved bots
-Winter themed map
-Lag fixes

Weapon balancing:
-Sniper 75 damage, 10 ammo
-AK 6 damage, 45 ammo
-Pistol 8 damage, 36 ammo
-Shotgun 15 ammo
-DoubleBarrel 10 ammo
-Bazooka 75 damage, 5 ammo
-Smg 2-6 damage, 100 ammo

Bug fixes:
-Loading screen
-Medkits
-Damage
-0 ammo bug
